translation.ha: Tauraron dan adam a sararin samaniya yana samun kira sannan yana nuna shi baya ƙasa, kusan nan take.

translation.en: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
translation.ha: An aika tauraron dan adam zuwa sararin samaniya ta hanyar roka. Masana kimiyya suna amfani da madubin hangen nesa a sararin samaniya saboda yanayin duniya yana gurbata wasu haskenmu da kallo.

translation.en: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
translation.ha: Yana daukan katon kunbo fiye da tsawon kafa 100 domin sanya tauraron dan adam ko abin kawo nesa kusa a sararin sama.

translation.en: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
translation.ha: Gare garen ta canza duniyan a hanyoyi na ban mamaki. Abu mafi girma da gare garen ta yi mana shine ta bamu hanyoyi masu sauki na sufuri.

translation.en: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
translation.ha: Lamarin ne ya kawo mana jirgin kasa, mota da hanyoyin sufuri da dama.

translation.en: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.
translation.ha: Karkashin su akwai wasu maguna masu matsakaicin yanayi wadanda ke cin abinci mai madaidaicin yanayi wanda ya fara daga zomaye zuwa barewa da barewan daji.

translation.en: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
translation.ha: Da karshe, akwai kananan kyanwoyi (da suka haɗa da kyanwoyin gida da suka gudu) da suke cin kananan naman da suka kama kamar kwari, ɓeraye, kadangaru, da tsuntsaye.

translation.en: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
translation.ha: Sirrin nasararsu ita ce tsarinsu na samun hutu, aiki na musamman da kowace kyanwa ke riko da shi domin kaucewa yin gasa da sauran.

translation.en: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
translation.ha: Zakuna ne dangin mage da suka fi daɗin ma’amala, suna taruwa wuri ɗaya abin da ake kira iko.

translation.en: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.
translation.ha: Garken zaki sun kunshi maza manya daya zuwa uku masu dangantaka, tare da mata da dama har zuwa talatin tare da ‘ya’ya.

translation.en: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
translation.ha: Mata yawanci suna da kusanci da juna, kasancewa babban dangi na yan uwa da 'ya'ya mata.

translation.en: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
translation.ha: Taruwar zakuna suna kamar rukunin kyar ko karnuka, dabbobi wanda suka yi kamar da zaki (amma ba sauran manyan kuliyoyi ba) a cikin hali, kuma suna da matukar cutarwa ga abincin su.

translation.en: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
translation.ha: Mai gudu sosai, damisa zai iya hawa (amma ba maikyau ba) yi iwo, tsalen nesa sosai da kuma ja so biya kamar kafin mutum.

translation.en: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.
translation.ha: Damisar Tiger tana cikin rukuni guda (Genus Panthera) kamar zakuna, damisar leopards, da jaguars. Wadannan dangin kyanwar guda huɗu sune kaɗai su ke iya ruri.

translation.en: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
translation.ha: Rurin damisa bai yi kama da cikeke ƙarfin murya zaki ba, amma ya fi kama da gurnani na jimlar kalmomin da aka faɗa da ƙarfi.

translation.en: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
translation.ha: 'Yan wasa suna son cin kananan dabbobi. Za su kama birai, macizai, zazzage da tsuntsaye in sun iya. Kusan dukkan dabbobin da dutsen ya farauto suna ƙasa da shi.

translation.en: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.
translation.ha: Masana ilimin kimiyya suna tunanin cewa ocelots na bin dabbobi da kama su ta hanyar sansanar sawun inda su ka bi su ka wuce.

translation.en: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
translation.ha: Suna iya gani sosai cikin duhu tare da ganin na dare, kuma suna tafiya cikin sanɗa. Kyanwar daji na farautar abin farautar su ta hanyar sajewa da wurin da su ke sannan su dirar wa abin farautar su.

translation.en: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
translation.ha: Yayin da wani karamin gungun dabbobi (jama’a kadan) su ka kasance sun rabu da babban gungun da su ke ciki (misali idan su ka koma kan wasu jerin tsaunuka, ko wani kogi ko kuma su ka koma wani sabon tsibirin yadda ba zasu iya komowa ba) akasari su kan sami kansu a muhalli na daban da inda su ka fito.

translation.en: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
translation.ha: Wannan sabon muhallin yana da albarkatu daban da kuma masu gasa daban, don haka sabuwar al’umma za ta buƙaci mabambantan fasali ko karɓuwa don zama ƙaƙƙarfar mai gasafiye da abin da su ka buƙata a baya.

translation.en: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before.
translation.ha: Asalin al’umman basu canza ba ko kadan, suna bukatan karbuwa kamar da.

translation.en: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
translation.ha: A kan lokaci, yayin da sabbin yawan jama’a suka fara daidaita da sabon yanayin su, sai su fara dawo kadan da kadan kamar waɗancan yawan jama'a.

translation.en: Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species.
translation.ha: A ƙarshe, bayan dubun dubbai ko ma shekaru miliyoyi, yawar jama’a biyu za su zauna da banbancin da ba za a kira su da wannan jinsin ba.

translation.en: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
translation.ha: Samar da sabon jinsi, hanya ce mai mahimmanci wadda ba za’a iya kauce mata ba a cikin tsarin asalin halittu.

translation.en: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
translation.ha: Shuke-shuke suna sanya iskar oxygen wanda mutane ke shaka, kuma suna shan iskar carbon-dioxide wanda mutane ke fitarwa (ma'ana fitar da iska).

translation.en: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.
translation.ha: Tsire-tsire suna yin abincinsu daga rana ta hanyar hotuna. Suna kuma bayar da inuwa.

translation.en: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
translation.ha: Muna gina gidajenmu ne daga itatuwa kuma muna yin sitirunmu daga itatuwa. Mafi yawan abincin da muke ci daga tsirrai ne. Idan babu tsirrai, mutane da dabbobi ba za su rayu ba.

translation.en: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
translation.ha: Mosasaurus ita ce babbar dabbar da ke farautar dabbobi a zamaninta, don haka bata fargabar komi ba, in ban da dabbobin Mosasaurs.

translation.en: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
translation.ha: Dogon haban sa sun cika da hakora masu ci kamar reza sama da 70, tare da ƙarin saiti a cikin rufin bakinsa, ma'ana babu mafaka ga wani abu wanda ya ketare hanyar sa.

translation.en: We don't know for sure, but it may have had a forked tongue. Its diet included turtles, large fish, other mosasaurs, and it may even have been a cannibal.
translation.ha: Tabbas bamu sani ba, amma yana iya kasancewa yana da harshe mai reshe. Abincinta ya haɗa da kunkuru, babban kifi, sauran mosasaurs, kuma yana iya kasancewa mai cin mutane ne.

translation.en: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.
translation.ha: Ta na kai wa duk wani abu farmaki da ya shiga ruwan, ko da kuwa gabjejen kakan kadangare mai suna T.Rex ba zai iya ja da shi ba.

translation.en: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse
translation.ha: Duk da yake yawancin abincinsu zai zama sananne gare mu, Romawa suna da nasu yankin na baƙin bukukuwa ko abubuwan biki da ba a saba da su ba, da suka haɗa da akuyar daji, dawisu, dodon-koɗi, da kuma wani nau’in ɓera da ake kira dormousee

translation.en: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
translation.ha: Wani banbamcin kuma shi ne talakawa da kuma mata sun cinye abincinsu yayin da suke zaune a kan kujeru, masu hannu da shuni kuma suna son cin abinci tare a inda suke zama a manya-manyan dakunan shakatawa domin cin abincin.

translation.en: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
translation.ha: Cikin abubuwan da ake ci a tsohuwar daular Rum, ba zai kasance abincin da ya zo Turai daga Amurka ba ko kuma daga Asia a karnonin da su ka zo daga baya.

translation.en: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
translation.ha: Alal misali, ba su da masara, babu tumatur, babu dankali. babu koko, kuma babu mutumin tsohuwar Rum da ya taɓa ɗanɗana talotalo.

translation.en: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
translation.ha: Yan Babylon sun gina wa kowanne allansu haikali da ya zama matsayin gidan allan.

translation.en: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
translation.ha: Mutane za su kawo hadaya ga abubuwan bauta yayin da malaman bautar za su yi ƙoƙarin biyan buƙatun abubuwan bautar ta hanyar bukukuwa da shagulgula.

translation.en: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
translation.ha: Kowane wajen bauta tana da budaden haraba tare da kebantaccen mihrabi wanda limamai kadai ke shiga.

translation.en: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
translation.ha: Wasu lokuta an gina hasumiya na musamman mai siffar dala, wanda ake kira ziggurats, domin su zama sashi na haikali.

translation.en: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.
translation.ha: Saman hasumiyar wuri ne na musamman na abun bautan.

translation.en: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
translation.ha: A cikin yanayi mai zafi na Gabas ta tsakiya, gida ba shi da matuƙar mahimmanci.

translation.en: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air.
translation.ha: Yawancin rayuwar dangin Ibrananci sun faru ne a sararin sama.

translation.en: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
translation.ha: Mata sun yi girki a farfajiyar; shagunan buɗe ido ne kawai suna kallon titi. An yi amfani da dutse don gina gidaje.

translation.en: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
translation.ha: Babu wani daji mai girma a ƙasar Kan'ana, saboda haka katako yana da tsada.

translation.en: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
translation.ha: An zauna a Greenland a warwatse. A cikin yankin Norse sun ce an kori Erik the Red daga Iceland saboda kisan kai, kuma lokacin da ya kaɗa ya yi yamma, sai ya gano Greenland kuma ya ba ta suna Greenland.

translation.en: But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time.
translation.ha: Amma duk da ganowar sa, dama tuni ƙabilun Eskimo suna zaune a wurin a lokacin.

translation.en: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
translation.ha: Kodayake kowace ƙasa ta kasance 'Scandinavia', akwai bambance-bambance masu yawa tsakanin mutane, sarakuna, al'adu da tarihin Denmark, Sweden, Norway da Iceland.

translation.en: If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence.
translation.ha: Idan ka kalli majigi mai suna National Treasure, za ka yi tsamanin an rubuta taswirar taska a bayan takardan Ƙudurin ‘Yancin Kai.

translation.en: However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map.
translation.ha: Sai dai kuma, wannan ba gaskiya ba ne. Duk da cewa akwai wani abu da aka rubuta a bayan daftarin, ba taswirar taskar arziki ba ce.

translation.en: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
translation.ha: An rubuta a bayan Bayanin Samun 'Yancin kai kalmomin “Asalin Sanarwar Samun' Yanci ne a ranar 4 ga Yuli 1776”. Rubutun ya bayyana a ƙasan takardar, juye.

translation.en: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.
translation.ha: A yayin da babu takamaiman wanda ya rubuta shi, an sani cewa a farkon rayuwar shi, babban takardan (yana daukar ma'aunin inci 29¾ zuwa inci 24½) an nada shi don ajiya.

translation.en: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
translation.ha: Don haka, da alama an ƙara tsarin rubutun ne kawai a matsayin laƙabi.

translation.en: The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free.
translation.ha: Saukar D-Day da yaƙe-yaƙe masu zuwa sun 'yantar da arewacin Faransa, amma har yanzu kudanci bai sami yanci ba.

translation.en: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them.
translation.ha: Faransawa '' Vichy '' suka mallake shi. Waɗannan mutanen Faransa ne waɗanda suka yi sulhu da Jamusawa a 1940 kuma suka yi aiki tare da masu mamaye maimakon yaƙar su.

translation.en: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".
translation.ha: A ranar 15 ga watan Agusta 1940, Kawayen sun mamaye kudancin Faransa, mamayar da aka yi wa lakabi da sunan “Operation Dragoon”.

translation.en: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.
translation.ha: A cikin makonni biyu kawai Amurkawa da Sojojin Faransa na 'yancin faransa suka 'yantar da kudancin Faransa kuma suka juya zuwa Jamus.

translation.en: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society.
translation.ha: Wayewa al’ada ce guda wadda mutane da dama da ke zama da aiki tare na daukan nasu ce, al’umma.

translation.en: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
translation.ha: Kalmar civilization ta zo ne daga kalmar latin civilis, ma’ana farar hula, mai dangantaka da civis na Latin, ma’ana yan kasa, da cavitas, ma’ana birni ko birnin-jiha, kuma yana ba da adadin yawan jama’a.

translation.en: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.
translation.ha: Biranen gari sune kashin bayan al'ummomi. Al'adar wayewar tana nuna wucewar ilimi a cikin tsararraki da yawa, rabe-raben al'adu da rarraba gaskiya.

translation.en: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
translation.ha: kananun al’adu galibi su kan shuɗe ba tare da barin tabbatattun shaidu na tarihi ba kuma ba a saka su cikin jerin manyan zamunna.

translation.en: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.
translation.ha: A lokacin Yaƙin Juyin Juya Hali, jihohi goma sha ukun sun kafa gwamnatin tsakiya mai rauni - wadda ta kunshi Majalisa kawai - a ƙarƙashin dokar gwamnatin hadin gwiwa.

translation.en: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
translation.ha: Majalisa ba ta da wani iko na kakaba haraji, sannan kuma, kasancewar babu ɓangarorin zartaswa da na shari’a na ƙasar, ta dogara ne kan hukumomin jihohi, waɗanda mafi yawanci ba sa bayar da haɗin kai, wajen ganin an tilasta aiki da dokokin.

translation.en: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
translation.ha: Hakanan ba ta da ikon yin watsi da dokokin haraji da haraji tsakanin jihohi.

translation.en: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
translation.ha: Labaran sun buƙaci yarjejeniya baki ɗaya daga dukkan jihohin kafin a iya gyara su kuma jihohi sun ɗauki gwamnatin tarraya a sauƙaƙe cewa wakilansu ba su nan.

translation.en: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
translation.ha: Masu kwallon ƙafa ta ƙasar Italiya, tare da ƙungiyar ƙwallon ƙafa ta ƙasar Jamus ita ce ta biyu mafi nasara a duniya kuma sun kasance zakarun ƙwallon ƙafa na FIFA a 2006.

translation.en: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
translation.ha: Shahararrun wasanni sun hada da kwallon kafa, kwallon kwando, wasan kwallon raga, wasan ruwa, wasan takobi, wasan kwallon rugby, tseren kekuna, kwallon gora, wasan kwallon gorar kankara da na tseren motoci na F1.

translation.en: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
translation.ha: Wasannin hunturu sun shahara a yankuna na Arewa, inda da Italiyawa su ke fafatawa a wasannin kasa da kasa da wasannin Olympic.

translation.en: Japans holds nearly 7,000 islands (the biggest being Honshu), making Japan the 7th largest island in the world!
translation.ha: Japans suna riƙe da kusan tsibirai 7,000 (babba shine Honshu), yana mai sanya Japan tsibiri na 7 mafi girma a duniya!

translation.en: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago"
translation.ha: Saboda tari/rukunin tsibirai da Japan ke da su, sau da yawa akan kira Japan, a matsayin yanki, da suna “tarin tsibirai”.

translation.en: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.
translation.ha: Farkon Taiwan ya faro tun baya cikin karni na 15 inda Turawa matukan jirgin ruwa da ke wucewa suka ɗauki sunan tsibirin a matsayin IIha Formosa, ko kyakyawan tsibiri.

translation.en: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
translation.ha: A cikin 1624, Kamfanin Dutch East India Company ya kafa tushe a kudu maso yammacin Taiwan, yana ƙaddamar da canji a cikin ayyukan noman hatsi na asali da ɗaukar ma'aikata na China don yin aiki a gonakin shinkafa da sukari.

translation.en: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1683, sojojin daular Qing (1644-1912) sun kwace ikon lardin Taiwan na yammacin da arewacin gabar teku, suka ayyana Taiwan a matsayin lardin daular Qing a shekarar 1885.

translation.en: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1895, bayan kayarwa a cikin Farkon Yaƙin Sino-Japanese (1894-1895), gwamnatin Qing su sa-hannu a Yarjejeniyar Shimonoseki, ta wanda ta bayar da mulkin kan Taiwan zuwa ga Japan, wanda ya yi mulkin tsibirin har 1945.

translation.en: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.
translation.ha: Machu Picchu ya hada da tsari uku, masu suna Intihuatana, Temple of the Sun, da Room of the Three Windows.

translation.en: Most of the buildings on the edges of the complex have been rebuilt in order to give tourists a better idea of how they originally appeared.
translation.ha: An sake gina mafi yawan gine-ginen da ke gefen rukunin ginin domin ƴan yawon buɗe ido su fahimci yadda asalin siffarsu ta ke.

translation.en: By 1976, thirty percent of Machu Picchu had been restored and restoration continues till today.
translation.ha: Zuwa shekarar 1976, an farfado da kashi talatin na gine ginen Machu Picchu kuma har yanzu ana ci gaba da aikin.

translation.en: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.
translation.ha: A misali, nau’in hoto marar motsi da aka fi sani a duniya shi ne 35mm, wanda shi ne girman fim na hoto da aka fi amfani da shi a ƙarshen zamanin fim ɗin hannu.

translation.en: It is still produced today, but more importantly its aspect ratio has been inherited by digital camera image sensor formats.
translation.ha: Har yau din nan ana sarrafa shi, amma muhimmin abu a nan kyamarar komi da ruwanka ce ta gaje shi da ke sunsuno hotuna.

translation.en: The 35mm format is actually, somewhat confusingly, 36mm in width by 24mm in height.
translation.ha: Abin mamaki shine zubin 35mm a haƙiƙa fadin 36mm ya ke da shi da kuma tsawon 24mm.

translation.en: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.
translation.ha: A lissafin wannan tsarin (idan aka raba sha biyu domin samun adadi mafi karancin lamba) zai kasance a daidaiton 3:2.

translation.en: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
translation.ha: Yawancin hanyoyin gama gari na yau da kullun (misali tsarin APS na iyali) ya kusa da wannan tsari.

translation.en: The much-abused and often-ridiculed rule of thirds is a simple guideline creating dynamism while keeping a measure of order in an image.
translation.ha: Dokar na uku ɗin da aka fi saɓa ko wulaƙantar da ita wani ja-gora mai sauƙi ne da yake ƙirƙira canji yayin riƙewa wani aunin tsari a cikin wani hoto.

translation.en: It states that the most effective place for the main subject is at the intersection of lines dividing the image into thirds vertically and horizontally (see example).
translation.ha: Ya bayyana cewa wuri mafi mahimmanci a darasin shine mahadar layuka wanda ya raba hoton a tsaye da kuma a kwance (duba misali).

translation.en: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny.
translation.ha: A wannan lokaci na tarihin Tarayyan Turai, cocin Katolika, wadda ta yi karfi da arziki, ta fuskanci bincike.

translation.en: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
translation.ha: Sama da shekara dubu addinin Kirista ya haɗe kasashen Turai waje guda duk da banbance banbance na harsuna da ala’adu.

translation.en: Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner.
translation.ha: Karfin barnansa ta shafe kowa daga sarki har na gama-gari.

translation.en: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin shishikan addinin krista shine yin amfani da arziki wajen magance matsaloli da kuma yakar talauci sannan kuma jami’in kudi na cocin suna can musamman saboda wannan dalilin.

translation.en: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
translation.ha: Babban cibiyar shugabancin coci ta kasance a Roma sama da dubban shekaru kuma mayar da arziki da mulki can ya jawo cece-kuce game da ko ana bin wannan shikashikin.

translation.en: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany.
translation.ha: Jim kaɗan bayan ɓarkewar tashin hankalin, Birtaniya ta fara toshe mashigan ruwa na Jamus.

translation.en: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
translation.ha: Dabarun sun yi tasiri, hana shigar da muhimman kayayyakin soja da na farar hulla, ko da yake wannan toshewa ta sabawa dokoki na ƙasa da ƙasa waɗanda yarjejeniyoyin ƙasa da ƙasa da dama na ƙarnoni biyu da suka wuce suka tsara.

translation.en: Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships.
translation.ha: Birtaniya ta dasa bama bamai a teku domin hana jiragen ruwa shiga wannan yanki na teku, abinda ke da hadari ga jiragen yan baruwanmu.

translation.en: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
translation.ha: Da shike akwai iyakacin amsa kan wannan dabara, Germany ta yi tsamanin irin wannan amsa ga yakinta na karkashin ruwa mara kima.

translation.en: During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation.
translation.ha: A lokacin 1920s, halaye mafi rinjaye na yawancin 'yan ƙasa da ƙasashe shine na zaman lafiya da keɓewa.

translation.en: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future.
translation.ha: Bayan ganin munanan abubuwa da munanan yaƙe-yaƙe yayin Yaƙin Duniya na ɗaya, al'ummomi sun so su guje wa irin wannan yanayin a nan gaba.

translation.en: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.
translation.ha: A cikin 1884, Tesla ya koma Amurka don karɓar aiki tare da Kamfanin Edison a cikin New York City.

translation.en: He arrived in the US with 4 cents to his name, a book of poetry, and a letter of recommendation from Charles Batchelor (his manager in his previous job) to Thomas Edison.
translation.ha: Ya iso Amurka da sulai 4 kacal, da wani littafin wakoki, da wasikar gabatarwa daga Charles Batchelor (manajansa a aikin da ya bari) zuwa ga Thomas Edison.

translation.en: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
translation.ha: Ƙasar China ta zamanin da tana da wata hanyar musamman ta nuna lokutan yanayi daban-daban; kowane mataki na China ko kowane iyali da ya hau karagar mulki to shi ma daula ce ta daban.

translation.en: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
translation.ha: Haka nan tsakanin kowace daula a kan sami lokaci na rashin zaman lafiya tsakanin larduna. Fitacce daga waɗannan zamuna shi ne zamanin Masarautu Uku da ya faru tsawon shekaru 60 tsakanin Daular Han da ta Jin.

translation.en: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
translation.ha: A wancan lokaci yaki ya barke tsakanin mafi yawan gidajen sarauta da ke hankoron kujerar sarki.

translation.en: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
translation.ha: Masarauta Uku ya kasance daya daga cikin zamunan da aka fi zub da jini a tarihin Tsohuwar China dubban mutane sun mutu suna gwagwarmaya don zama a kan madaukakiyar kujera a babbar fada a Xi’an.

translation.en: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
translation.ha: Akwai tasiri na zamantakewa da siyasa masu yawa kamar amfani da tsarin awo cikakke, barin kama-karya zuwa jamhuriyya, kishin ƙasa tare da imanin cewa ƙasar ta mutanen ƙasa ce ba mutum ɗaya mai mulki ba.

translation.en: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
translation.ha: Hakanan bayan juyin halin an bude ayyuka ga duk maza masu neman aiki inda hakan ya bada dama ga masu buri da kokari su sami cigaba.

translation.en: Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber.
translation.ha: Hakanan ya kasance ga sojoji saboda maimakon martaba sojoji ya kasance bisa la'akari da aji sai yanzu suka dogara da cailaber.

translation.en: The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
translation.ha: Juyin Juya Hali na Faransa ya kuma ba sauran wasu mutane masu tsananin karfi na wata ƙasa damar fara nasu juyin juya halin.

translation.en: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation.
translation.ha: Muhammadu yana matukar sha'awar al'amuran da suka wuce rayuwar wannan duniya. Ya na yawan ziyarar kogon da a ka fi sani da na “Hira” a tsaunin “Noor” (wato haske) domin kadaicewa yayi tunani.

translation.en: he cave itself, which survived the times, gives a very vivid image of Muhammad’s spiritual inclinations.
translation.ha: ya ɓoye kansa, wanda ya rayu a lokacin, yana ba da hoton karkatawar ruhaniyar Muhammad a tsarari.

translation.en: Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world.
translation.ha: Kasancewa a saman ɗayan duwatsun arewacin Makka, kogon ya zama ya keɓe daga sauran duniya.

translation.en: In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation.
translation.ha: A hakika akwai matukar wahalar gano wajen ko ma ka idan ka san ya kasance. Kana shiga cikin kogon zaka ji kadaita ta kama ka.

translation.en: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.
translation.ha: Babu abin da za a iya gani face kyakkyawan sararin samaniya da tsaunuka masu yawa da ke kewayen. Baka iya ji ko ganin wadannan daga cikin kogon.

translation.en: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
translation.ha: Babban alwatikan a Giza shine kawai ɗayan abubuwan al'ajabi bakwai da har yanzu suke tsaye a yau.

translation.en: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
translation.ha: Babban Masarautar da Masarawa suka gina a ƙarni na uku KZ, Babban alwatika yana ɗayan manyan gine-ginen dala da aka gina don girmama Fir'auna da ya mutu.

translation.en: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx.
translation.ha: Giza Plateau, ko “Giza Necropolls” a Kwarin Massar na matattu yana kunshe da dala iri-iri ( wanda babban dala shine mafi girma), yawancin kananan kaburbura, gidajen bauta, da babban gunkin Sphinx.

translation.en: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
translation.ha: Babbar dalar an kafa ta ne domin girmama Fir’auna Khufu, kuma da daman cikinsu da kushewu da wuraren ibada an gina su ne domin matan Khufu tare da iyalan gidansa.

translation.en: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.
translation.ha: Alamar “kwarin sama” ta yi kama da V sannan “alamar kwarin ƙasa” kamar maɗauri ne ko murabba’i da ya kuskure gefen ƙasan ta.

translation.en: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.
translation.ha: Sama yana nufin ya kamata ka fara daga sama ka tura bakan, sannan kasan yana nufin ka fara daga kwado (wanda shine inda hannunka ke rike da baka) ka ja bakan.

translation.en: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
translation.ha: Yawancin lokoci up-bow na fitar da murya mai laushi, haka kuma down-bow na da karfi da tabatarwa sosai.

translation.en: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
translation.ha: Ka saki jikinka wajen bada naka makin, amma kar ka manta makin da aka buga su na da dalilai na kida, don haka ya kamata a girmama su.

translation.en: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
translation.ha: A firgice Sarki Louis da Sarauniya Marie Antoinette da yayansu guda biyu (Marie yar shekaru 11 da kuma Louis-Charles dan shekara hudu) da kuma yar'uwar Sarki, Madam Elizabeth, wadanda matan kasuwa masu bore a ranar 6 ga watan Oktoba 1789 sun tilasta musu komawa birnin Faris daga garin Versailles.

translation.en: In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen.
translation.ha: A cikin tarago, suka koma zuwa Paris zagaye da wasu gungun mutane da ke ihu suna kalaman barazanar a kan Sarki da Sarauniya.

translation.en: The mob of people forced the King And Queen to have their carriage windows wide open.
translation.ha: Abokai masu nisa, ba tare da wayar tarho ba, wayar tauraron dan adam zata iya zama mai zaɓar.

translation.en: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
translation.ha: A wata lokaci memba na yan zanga-zanga shugaban wata sarauta tsarewa sun kashe wata Versailles a gaban Sarauniya mai firgita.

translation.en: The war expenditures of U.S. imperialism in the conquest of the Philippines were paid for by the Filipino people themselves.
translation.ha: Kuɗaɗen ɗaukar nauyin yaƙi na mulkin mallakar Amurka a yakin mallake Philippines mutanen Phillippines ne da kansu suka biya.

translation.en: They were compelled to pay taxes to the U.S. colonial regime to defray a major part of the expenditures and the interest on bonds floated in the name of the Philippine government through the Wall Street banking houses.
translation.ha: An tilasta musu su biya haraji ga gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Amurka don biyan wani babban kaso na kudaden da aka kashe da kuma kuɗin-ruwa na kan basukan da aka fitar da sunan gwamnatin Philippines ta cikin bankunan Wall Street.

translation.en: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism.
translation.ha: Tabbas, babban ribar da aka samu daga kwarar da aka dade ana yi wa ‘yan Filifins ya zama shi ne tushen nasarar mallakar bayan yanci da Amurka ta samu.

translation.en: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order.
translation.ha: Don fahimtar Templars dole ne mutum ya fahimci mahallin da ya haifar da ƙirƙirar tsari.

translation.en: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
translation.ha: Zamanin da al'amuran suka faru galibi ana masu lakabi da Mafi girmn Shekarun Tsakiya lokacin tarihin Turai a ƙarni na 11, 12, da 13th (AD 1000 - 1300).

translation.en: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.
translation.ha: Babban Shekaru ta Tsakiya ya gabace Shakarun Tsakiyar Farko wanda Shakaru Tsakiyar Da Sun Gabata su ka bi, wanda a cikin babban taron ya gama kusan shekaru 1500.

translation.en: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
translation.ha: Wanzuwar Fasahar Ƙere-ƙere al’amari ne da ya haɗo wani faffaɗan fage na ra’ayoyi a aikace, daga bunƙasar fasaha ko muhimmancin fasahar ƙere-ƙere zuwa ga haƙiƙanin sanin cewa makomar dan adam tana tafiya ne bisa tabbatacciyar hikima wadda ke da alaƙa da dokokin kimiyya da kuma bayyanar su a cikin fasahar ƙere-ƙere.

translation.en: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
translation.ha: Yawancin fassarar tabbatuwar fasahar zamani sun kunshi ra’ayi mafiya yaduwa guda biyu: cewa na fasaha ita kanta na bin tafarki wacce ta sha bamban da tasirin al’ada ko siyasa da kuma cewa fasaha nada “tasiri” ga al’umma masu asali, fiye da na tsarin yanayin zamantakewa.

translation.en: For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads.
translation.ha: Misali, mutum na iya cewa motar tilas ba zata haifar da ci gaban hanyoyi ba.

translation.en: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
translation.ha: Koyaya, hanyar sadarwa ta ƙasa gabaɗaya ba ta da tasirin tattalin arziƙi don ƙarancin motoci, saboda haka ana ƙirƙirar sabbin hanyoyin samarwa don rage farashin mallakar mota.

translation.en: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.
translation.ha: Hakanan mallakar motoci da yawa yana haifar da yawan hadari a kan hanyoyi, wanda ke haifar da kirkirar sabbin dabaru a fannin kiwon lafiya don gyaran jikin da ya lalace.

translation.en: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.
translation.ha: Tsarin fasaha da adabi samar da al’adu, wanda marubuta irinsu Gothe, Fichte da Schlegel su ka samar.

translation.en: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
translation.ha: A cikin siyakin romanci, yanayin kasa ya canza mutane, kuma lokaci da yawa sai al'adu da al'adu masu alaƙa da wannan yanayin suka taso, kuma waɗannan, kasancewar suna jituwa da matsayin jama'a, sun fi ƙa'idodi da aka kafa bisa doka da oda.

translation.en: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda aka san Paris da babban birnin salon zamani na duniyar yau, ana ɗaukar Constantinople a matsayin babban birni na zamani na Turai.

translation.en: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.
translation.ha: Shaharar ta na kasancewa cibiyar jin daɗi ya fara ne a kusan shekara ta 400 A.D. kuma ya kai har kusan 1100 A.D.

translation.en: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
translation.ha: Matsayinta ya yi kasa a ƙarni na goma sha biyu musamman sakamakon dawowar mayakan jihadin kuros dauke da kyaututtuka irin su siliki da kayan ɗanɗanon abinci waɗanda ake ɗauka da daraja fiye da abubuwan da ake sayarwa a kasuwannin Daular Rum.

translation.en: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.
translation.ha: A wannan lokacin ne sauya mukamin na Kawar Babban Birni daga Constantinople zuwa Paris ya faru.

translation.en: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.
translation.ha: Tsarin Gothic ya yi shura a tsakankanin karni na 10 zuwa na 11 da kuma karni na 14.

translation.en: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.
translation.ha: A farkon lamari, kabilar Byzantine da ke gabashi ta karfafa saka tufafi.

translation.en: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.
translation.ha: Koyaya, saboda saurin tashoshin sadarwa, salo a yamma na iya zama baya zuwa shekara 25 zuwa 30.

translation.en: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.
translation.ha: a karshen karnin tsakiya sashin nahiyar turai na yamma ta fara bunkasa nata tsarin. Daya daga cikin abubuwan da aka gina a wannan lokacin da taimakon ‘yan jihadi shine fara amfani da anini don rike riga.

translation.en: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
translation.ha: Noma domin abinci shine tsarin noma wanda ake yinsa domin kawai a samar da abincin da zai wadatar da mutum da iyalansa.

translation.en: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
translation.ha: Noma domin abinci kawai abu ne mai sauki, sau da yawa, ana amfani da iri na shuka wanda ya dace da kasar noman wajen, tare da sauya abin shuka duk shekara a gona guda, domin samun cikakkiyar yabanya.

translation.en: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
translation.ha: A tarihance mafi yawan manoma sun kasance suna aikin noma kuma wannan har yanzu haka lamarin yake a yawancin ƙasashe masu tasowa.

translation.en: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
translation.ha: Rassan al’adu suna sada mutane masu tunani iri daya da suke ji tsarin rayuwa na al’umma bai dace da su ba inda suke ba su damar ganin suna da muhimanci a al’umma.

translation.en: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.
translation.ha: Ana iya bambanta kananan al’adu saboda shekara, bangarenci na jama’a, matsayi cikin al’umma, guri, da/ko kuma jintsin membobi.

translation.en: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.
translation.ha: Kyawawan siffofin da suke tabbatar da wata ƙaramar al’ada a matsayin wadda ta fita daban kan iya kasancewa na yare, kyau, addini, siyasa, jinsi, na yanki, ko hadin abubuwa.

translation.en: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
translation.ha: Membobin masana'antar sau da yawa suna nuna alamar kasancewa memba ta hanyar rarrabe mai amfani da alama ta salon, wanda ya haɗa da salon, halayen kirki, da ɗaukar hoto.

translation.en: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin matakan da ake amfani dashi domin nuna muhimmacin zamantakewa shine nuna kadan daga cikin hali na takaici wanda yara suka fuskanta, ta hanyar sakaci, masifa, ko cin zarafi, kuma basu zamantakewa da manya ba yayin da suke girma.

translation.en: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
translation.ha: Ana kiran irin waɗannan yaran “sakakku” ko masu wuyar juyawa. Mutane sun sha kulle waɗansu sakakkun yara (yawanci iyayensu ne); a wasu al’amuran kuma barin yaran na da alaƙa da ƙin amincewar iyaye da naƙasar basira ko ta jikin yaro.

translation.en: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
translation.ha: Yaran mara zuciya masu jin tsoro na iya fuskantar mummunan cin zarafin yara ko rauni kafin a watsar da su ko su gudu.

translation.en: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
translation.ha: Wasu ana zargin dabbobi ne suka yi rainon su; an ce wasu sun yi rayuwa a daji da kansu.

translation.en: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
translation.ha: Lokacin da ba dabba ba ta dabbaro gabaɗaya, yaro mai ɗaukar hoto yana nuna halayensa (a cikin iyakokin zahiri) kusan gaba daya kamar na kulawar-dabbobi, kamar tsoron sa ko rashin kulawa ga mutane.

translation.en: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
translation.ha: Duk da yake tushen koyo game da aiki yakamata ya sauƙaƙa ilmantarwa kuma ya zama mai ban sha'awa, ƙwanƙwasa aiki ya wuce mataki.

translation.en: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
translation.ha: Nannadewa ba hanya ce ta ilmantarwa ba amma taimako ne wanda ke bayar da tallafi ga mutanen da ke fuskantar sabon ƙwarewar ilmantarwa kamar amfani da sabon shirin komputa ko fara sabon aiki.

translation.en: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
translation.ha: Wuraren zartar da hukuncin na iya zama na gaske ko kuma holoko, ko kuma a wani kaulin, malami ka iya zama hakan, sai dai wani dan kankanin abu manhajar Microsoft Office.

translation.en: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
translation.ha: Ana saka kariya cikin manhajojin domin su yi tambaya, su yi nuni da bada bayanai wadanda dalibai su kadai ba za su iya fuskanta ba.

translation.en: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.
translation.ha: Ana sanya yara a Gidan Reno saboda dalilai masu yawa da suka hada da sakaci, zin zarafi, har ma zuwa ƙwace.

translation.en: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a ce akwai yaron da zai girma a cikin muhallin da babu reno, kulawa da kuma almantarwa, amma suna yi.

translation.en: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.
translation.ha: Mun fahimci Tsarin Kulawa na jarirai ya zama yankin aminci ga waɗannan yara.

translation.en: Our foster care system is supposed to provide safe homes, loving caregivers, stable education, and reliable health care.
translation.ha: Ya kamata tsarinmu na karɓar riko ya samar da gidaje masu aminci, masu reno da ke nuna soyayya, ingantaccen ilimi, da tabbataccen tsarin kulawa da lafiya.

translation.en: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
translation.ha: Yakamata renon yara ya samar da dukkan bukatu wadanda su ke da bukatu a gidan da aka dauko su.

translation.en: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication.
translation.ha: Yanar gizo ta hada abubuwa biyu na sadarwar tsakanin al’umma da daidaikun mutane.

translation.en: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.
translation.ha: Kyakyawan halaye na intanet suna haifar da karin girma dangane da matakan gamsarwa.

translation.en: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).
translation.ha: Alal misali, “koyo” da “cudanya” ana kallonsu a matsayin muhimman hanyoyin ƙarfafa yin amfani da yanar gizo (James et al., 1995).

translation.en: “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
translation.ha: “Shiga cikin mutum” da “ci gaba da dangantaka” na cikin sabbin fannonin kwarin gwiwa ta Eighmey da McCord (1998) yayinda suka bincika daukin masu sauraro a gidajen yanar gizo.

translation.en: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
translation.ha: Amfani da rikodin bidiyo ya haifar da bincike mai mahimmanci a cikin fassara bayanan fuska, motsin fuska waɗanda ba sa wuce lokaci ƙalilan.

translation.en: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.
translation.ha: Musamman ma kamar, ikirarin da ya yi cewa zai gano ko mutum yana karyar fassarar/fahimtar kananan maganganu yadda suke.

translation.en: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.
translation.ha: A cikin takardar shi mai take Jawabin Shugaba Oliver Sacks ya bayyana yadda mutane dake fuskantar masala wajen fahimtar jawabi bisa ga masalar tabin kwakwalwa, yace duk da haka suna iya fahimtar gaskiya daidai.

translation.en: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
translation.ha: Har ma yana ba da shawarar cewa irin waɗannan damar a fassara halayen mutane za su iya rabawa ta dabbobi kamar su karnukan gida.

translation.en: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
translation.ha: Binciken ƙarni na ashirin ya nuna cewa akwai rabe-raben halittar gado guda biyu: ɓoyayye da na bayyananne.

translation.en: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.
translation.ha: Maye gurbi yana ƙara sabon bambancin kwayoyin, kuma zaɓi ya cire shi daga tafkin bambancin da aka bayyana.

translation.en: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
translation.ha: Rabuwa da sake haduwa iri dabam-dabam baya da gaba tsakanin gidan ruwan guda biyu a kowace karni.

translation.en: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
translation.ha: A can cikin yankin savanna, yana da wahala ga wata halitta dangin biri da ke da tsarin narkewar abinci irin na mutum ta iya gamsar da buƙatunta na sinadarin amino daga albarkatun tsirrai da ake da su.

translation.en: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.
translation.ha: Bugu da ƙari, ƙin yin hakan yana tattare da munanan sakamako:kamar rashin yin girma, rashin abinci mai gina jiki, da kuma a karshe mutuwa.

translation.en: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
translation.ha: Ma’dinan tsirrai da aka fi saurin amfani da su sun kasance sunadaran gina jiki da za'a iya samu a ganye da ƙwaya, amma waɗannan suna da tauri ga halittu irin mu wajen narkewa har sai an dafa su.

translation.en: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
translation.ha: Sabanin haka, abincin dabbobi (tururuwa, gara, ƙwai) ba kawai ana iya narkewa cikin sauƙi ba, amma suna samar da sunadarai masu yawa waɗanda ke ɗauke da dukkan muhimman amino acid.

translation.en: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
translation.ha: In an yi la’akari da dukkan abubuwa, bai kamata mu yi mamaki ba idan magabatanmu suka magance “matsalar kayan gina jiki” ta irin hanyar da goggon biri a yankin savanna suke yi a yau.

translation.en: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
translation.ha: Katse bacci yanayi ne na farkawa da gangan cikin lokacin yin bacci na al’ada da kuma komawa bacci cikin dan kaknkanin lokaci daga baya (minti 10-60).

translation.en: This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you.
translation.ha: Ana iya yin hakan a sauƙaƙe ta amfani da agogon ƙararrawa wanda ba shi da nutsuwa don kawo ku cikin sani ba tare da an tashe ku ba.

translation.en: If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off.
translation.ha: Idan ka sami kanka ka sake saita agogo a cikin barcinka, ana iya sanya shi a ɗaya gefen ɗakin, yana tilasta ka tashi daga kan gado don kashe shi.

translation.en: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
translation.ha: Sauran zabukan da suka danganta da lissafin ɗabi’ar rayuwa sun kunshi shan kayan ruwa da yawa (musamman ruwa ko shayi, sanannen sinadari mai jawo fitsari) kafin barci, da ke tilastawa mutum ya tashi ya yi ftisari.

translation.en: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.
translation.ha: Yawan kwanciyar hankali da mutum yake da shi ya danganta da kishiyantar yawan tashin hankali a cikin jikin mutum da ruhunsa.

translation.en: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.
translation.ha: Rage tashin hankali, haka kuma yawan fata na gari da karfin rayuwa zai gabatar. Ko wani mutum na da damar samun kwanciyar hankali da gamsuwa.

translation.en: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
translation.ha: Kowa zai iya cimma wayewa. Abinda kawai ke tsaye kan hanyar wannan burin shine tashin hankali da fargaba.

translation.en: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga.
translation.ha: Buddhist na Tibet ya dogara ne da koyarwar Buddha, amma hanyar mahayana da ta hanyar fasahar India da yawa sun ninka ta.

translation.en: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.
translation.ha: A bisa ƙa’ida Budancin Tibet yana da sauƙi. Ya kunshi tsarin motsa jiki na Yoga, kadaicewa domin tunani da kuma bin tafarkin son kowa da komai.

translation.en: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
translation.ha: Da Kundalini Yoga an samar da kuzarin Kundalini (kuzarin wayarwa da kai) an farka ta hanyar motsawar jiki, motsawar nufanci, mantras da ganin wa.

translation.en: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
translation.ha: Ginshiƙen tunanun Tibetan shi ne Abin Bauta Yoga. Duk da yake kafafen gani na abubuwan bauta daban-daban hanyoyin makamashi an tsaftace su, akan buɗe chakras inda ake ƙirƙirar tunanin wayewa.

translation.en: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
translation.ha: Jamus abokiyar gabar kowa ce a Yakin Duniya ta 2, wanda hakan ta haifar da haɗin kai tsakanin Tarayyar Sobiyet da Amurka. Da ƙarewar yakin sai sabanin tsarin rayuwa, al’amura da al'adu ya jawo rabuwar kan ƙasashen.

translation.en: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
translation.ha: Tare da shekaru biyu na ƙarshen yaƙin, tsoffin maƙasudin yanzu abokan gaba ne kuma aka fara Yakin Sanyi.

translation.en: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
translation.ha: An tsara zai kai shekaru 40 masu zuwa kuma za ayi yaƙe shi a hakika,ta sojojin haya, a filayen yaƙi daga Africa zuwa Asia, a Afghanistan, Cuba da sauran wurare da dama.

translation.en: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
translation.ha: Ya zuwa 17 ga Satumba, 1939, tsaron Poland ya riga ya karye, kuma fatan kawai da ake da shi shine na janyewa sannan a sake shiri a kan tozon gadar Romania.

translation.en: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
translation.ha: Koda yake wannan shiri ya tashi daga aiki dare ɗaya, yayin da sama da sojoji 800,000 na tarayyar Soviet su ka shiga Belarus da Ukraine inda su ka shata fagen daga bayan mamayar kasar Poland wanda ya karya yarjejeniyar sulhu da aka yi a Riga, sulhu zaman lafiya na kasashen Soviet da Poland da ma wasu yarjeniyoyin na kasashen duniya tsakanin kasarshe biyu ko fiye da haka.

translation.en: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.
translation.ha: Amfani da jirgin ruwa domin kwasan kayayyaki shine mafi inganci wajen kwasan mutane da yawa da kayayyaki ta teku.

translation.en: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.
translation.ha: Ainihin aikin sojojin ruwa shine domin tabbatar cewa kasarka ta kula da iyawa domin motsa mutanenka da kayayyaki, yayinda kuma a lokaci daya, tsoma baki da kokarin da abokan gaba ke yi domin tafiyar da mutane da kayayyaki.

translation.en: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin fitattun misalai na kwana nan game da wannan shine gumurzun yankin Atlantika ta Arewa lokacin Yakin Duniya na biyu. Amurkawa suna ƙoƙarin jigilar da sojoji da kayan yaki zuwa ƙetarenTekun Atlantika don taimakawa Biritaniya.

translation.en: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.
translation.ha: A lokaci daya, dakarun ruwa na Jamus, ta hanyar amfani da jirgin U-boats, na kokarin tsayar da wannan cinkoson.

translation.en: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
translation.ha: Da Sojan taron dangi ba su yi nasara ba, watakila da Jamus ta iya yi mamaye Biritaniya kamar ta sauran Turai.

translation.en: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran.
translation.ha: Ana ganin akuya ta kasance gida ta farko kusan shekaru 10,000 da suka gabata a tsaunukan Zagros na Iran.

translation.en: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
translation.ha: Al’adu da ƙabilun zamanin da ne su ka fara adana su domin sauƙin samun madara, gashi, nama, da kuma fatu.

translation.en: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
translation.ha: A koyaushe ana ajiye awakin gida a cikin garken shanun da ke yawo a kan tsaunuka ko wasu wuraren kiwo, galibi masu kiwon awaki waɗanda yara da samari ne ke kula da su, kwatankwacin sanannen makiyayi. Wadannan hanyoyin kiwo har yanzu ana amfani dasu.

translation.en: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
translation.ha: An samar da layukan tarago a Ingila tun a wajejen Ƙarni na 16.

translation.en: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa keken dokin sun kunshi katako a jere, amma su kan ba da dama ga dawakan da ke jan su yin sauri tare da jan manyan kaya fiye da a kan hanyoyi masu gargada na zamanin.

translation.en: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.
translation.ha: An sanya Crossties tun da wuri don su tsayar layukan. Sai dai, hankali, an gano cewa layukan za su fi dacewa idan suna da ɗori na ƙarfe a saman su.

translation.en: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
translation.ha: Wannan ya zama aikin gama gari, sai ƙarfe ya haifar da ƙarin lalacewa a ƙafafun katako na kekunan.

translation.en: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
translation.ha: Daga karshe, an sauya tayoyin katako da na karfe. A cikin 1767 an kaddamar da farkon hanyar jirgin kasa kerar karfe.

translation.en: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).
translation.ha: Hanyar sufuri ta farko da aka sani ita ce tafiya da ƙafa, mutane sun fara tafiya a miƙe shekaru miliyan biyu da suka gabata lokacin bayyanawar Homo Erectus (ma'ana miƙaƙƙen mutum).

translation.en: Their predecessors, the Australopithecus did not walk upright as habitually.
translation.ha: Magabatan su, Australopithecus ba su yi tafiya miƙe ba kamar yadda ya ke a ɗabi’ance.

translation.en: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
translation.ha: An sami kwarewar dabbobi masu tafiya da kafafu biyu a ƙasusuwan tarihi na Australopithecus daga shekaru miliyan 4.2-3.9 da suka shude, duk da cewa watakila Sahelanthropus sun yi tafiya da kafafu biyu tun wajen shekaru miliyan bakwai da suka gabata.

translation.en: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree.
translation.ha: Za mu iya fara zaman nuna sabo ga muhalli, za mu iya shiga cikin yunƙurin inganta muhalli, kuma mu kan iya zama ‘yan gwagwarmaya don rage wahala nan gaba a wani mataki.

translation.en: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them.
translation.ha: Wannan kamar magani ne na alamun cuta a lokuta da yawa. Koyaya, idan ba kawai muna son magancewa ta ɗan lokaci ba ne, to ya kamata mu samo tushen matsalolin, kuma mu kashe su.

translation.en: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
translation.ha: A bayyane ya ke cewa duniya ta canza sosai saboda ci gaban Dan Adam a fannonin kimiyya da fasaha, kuma matsaloli sun karu sosai sakamakon yawan jama’a da halayyar mutane ta almubazzaranci.

translation.en: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.
translation.ha: Bayan Majalisar wakilai ta amince da shi a ranar 4 ta Yuli, sa'an nan aka aika wani daftarin da aka rubuta da hannu wanda Shugaban Majalisar John Hancock ya sa hannu da ɗan nesa zuwa ga shagon buga rubutu na John Dunlap.

translation.en: Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as "Dunlap broadsides".
translation.ha: Cikin daren an buga tsakanin 150 da 200 wanda aka fi sani da “Dunlap Broadsides”.

translation.en: The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8.
translation.ha: John Nixon ne ya yi karatun farko na daftarin a bainar jama’a cikin filin Independence Hall a ranar 8 ga watan Yuli.

translation.en: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
translation.ha: An aika ma George Washington ɗaya a ranar 6 ga Yuli, wanda ya karanta ma sojojinsa a New York ranar 9 ga Yuli. Wani kwafi ya isa Landan a ranar 10 ga watan Agusta.

translation.en: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.
translation.ha: Manyan bangarori 25 na Dunlap da har yanzu aka san sun wanzu sune mafi thufan kwafin rubutattun takardun. Kwafin rubutun hannun na asali ya salwanta.

translation.en: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.
translation.ha: Yawancin masana burbushin halittu a yau sunyi imanin cewa ƙungiyar dinosaur daya ta rayu kuma tana raye a yau. Muna kiran su tsuntsaye.

translation.en: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly.
translation.ha: Mutane da yawa basa tunanin cewa suna daga cikin halitun dinosaurs saboda suna da fiffike kuma suna iya tashi sama.

translation.en: But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur.
translation.ha: Amma akwai wasu abubuwa game da tsuntsuye dake kama da na dinosaur.

translation.en: They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.
translation.ha: Suna da ƙafafu masu gurji-gurji da fartuna, suna yin ƙwai, kuma suna tafiya kan ƙafafunsu biyu na baya kamar wani T-Rex.

translation.en: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.
translation.ha: Kusan duk kwamfutoci da ake amfani da su a yau sun dogara ne akan iya sarrafa bayanai wanda ake rufewa a sigar tagwayen lambobi.

translation.en: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
translation.ha: Lambar binary na iya samun ɗaya daga darajoji biyu, misali 0 ko 1, kuma waɗannan lambobin ana kiransu da lambobin binary - ko guntaye, in za a yi amfani da yaren kwamfuta.

translation.en: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made.
translation.ha: Harbuwa da guba a cikin jiki ba abu ne da ake iya ganewa da wuri ba. Alamu irinsu amai gama gari ne don haka ba a iya tantancewa da wurwuri.

translation.en: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
translation.ha: Hanya mafi saukin gane ko ana sami guba a ciki, shine watakila idan an sami budadden kwano na magani ko wasu sinadarai masu guba da ake amfanin yau da gobe da su a gida.

translation.en: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
translation.ha: Duba bayanin da ke jiki domin samun bayanai na taimakon gaggawa agame da gubar.

translation.en: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
translation.ha: Likitocin dabbobi na amfani da kalmar bug wa wannan rukunin kwari.

translation.en: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans.
translation.ha: An samo kalmar tun zamanin da daga sanayyarsu da kudin cizo, wato wasu kwari da su ke zama muhallin mutane suna tsotsar jininsu.

translation.en: Both Assassin-bugs and Bed-bugs are nidicolous, adapted to living in nest or housing of their host.
translation.ha: Duka kwarin mutuwa da kuma kudin cizo masu zaman gida ne, sun saba da zama a gidansu ko mazaunin wanda suke shan jininsa.

translation.en: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults.
translation.ha: A duk faɗin Amurka, akwai kusan rahoto 400,000 na cutar Multiple Sclerosis (MS), abinda ya sa ta zama ja-gaba cikin ciwukan sadarwa a jiki ga matasa da masu shekaru tsaka-tsaki.

translation.en: MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve.
translation.ha: Cutar MS cuta ce da ke shafar lakkar jikin dan adam, da ya hadar da kwakwalwa da jijiyar lakkar da kuma na kai sakonni.

translation.en: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
translation.ha: Bincike ya gano cewa mata sun fi alamar samun MS da ninka biyu a kan maza.

translation.en: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.
translation.ha: Ma'aurata na iya yanke shawara cewa ba shine maslaharsu ba, ko maslaha ga ɗansu, tarbiyyar da jariri.

translation.en: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.
translation.ha: Waɗannan ma'aurata na iya zaɓar yin shirin tallafi ga jaririn.

translation.en: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.
translation.ha: A tsarin mallakar yaro, iyayen da suka haifi yaron za su dakatar da haƙƙinsu na iyaye saboda wasu ma'aurata su kasance iyayen sa.

translation.en: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
translation.ha: Babbar manufar kimiyya ita ce gano yadda duniya ke wanzuwa ta hanyar kimiyya. Alal hakika wannan hanya ta bincike ita ce ke yin jagora ga mafi yawan bincike na kimiyya.

translation.en: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
translation.ha: Ba shi kaɗai bane dai, yin gwaji, kuma gwaji wata hanya ce ta jarrabawa da ake amfani da ita domin kawar da ɗaya ko fiye daga cikin harsashe da za a samu. yin tambayoyi, da fadin ra’ayi su ma suna yin jagora ga binciken kimiyya.

translation.en: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
translation.ha: Masu rajin ɗabi’ar yanayi da masana falsafa sun maida hankali kan tsofaffin rubuce-rubuce, musamman, akan Baibul da a ka rubuta da yaren Latin.

translation.en: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
translation.ha: Cikin wadanda aka amince da su akwai ra’ayin/fahimtar Aristotle kan dukkan batutuwan kimiyya, ciki har da ilimin halayyar dan adam.

translation.en: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda ilimin Girka ya ragu, ita yamma ta sami kanta daga yankewar tushen falsafa da tushen kimiyya.

translation.en: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.
translation.ha: An lura cewa yawancin tsarukan yadda jiki ke aiki da kuma halayya sun dogara ne da samuwar zangogi yadda abubuwa ke juyawa wadanda agogunan jiki ke samarwa.

translation.en: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.
translation.ha: sauti na lokaci-lokaci, wanda ba su martani ga alamu na yanayi, an kayyade su don hallitu masu rai har da kwayoyin cuta, da fungi da tsirai, da dabbobi.

translation.en: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
translation.ha: Halittun jikin mutum sune suke ci gaba da wanzuwa a yayin da mutum ke gudu ko da ba tare da wasu abubuwa daga waje/gefe.

translation.en: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material.
translation.ha: Gwajin Hershey da Chase na ɗaya daga cikin ra’ayoyin da ke kan gaba da ke nuni da cewa DNA wani abu ne na rayuwa.

translation.en: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
translation.ha: Hershey da Chase sun yi amfani da phages, ko ƙwayoyin cututtuka, wajen shigar da sinadarin DNA nasu a cikin wata ƙwayar cuta.

translation.en: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
translation.ha: Sunyi gwaje-gwaje guda biyu wanda ke nuna alamar ko DNA a cikin fage tare da phosphorus na rediyoaktif ko furotin na phage tare da sulfur na rediyo.

translation.en: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.
translation.ha: Maye gurbi zai iya samun bambancin nau'ikan sakamako iri daban-daban dangane da nau'in maye gurbi, mahimmancin yanki na kayan gado ya shafa kuma ko kwayoyin halita da abin ya shafa sune kwayoyin halita.

translation.en: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
translation.ha: Rikiɗa a ƙwayoyin halitta na layin ƙwayar cuta ne kaɗai za a iya gadar wa yara, yayin da rikiɗa a wani wuri kan iya haddasa mutuwar ƙwayar halitta ko cutar sankara.

translation.en: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
translation.ha: Yawon shakatawa na yanayi yana jan hankalin mutane masu sha'awar ziyartar yankuna na asali don jin daɗin shimfidar wuri, gami da tsirrai da dabbobin daji.

translation.en: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
translation.ha: Misalin ire-iren ayyukan sun hada farauta, kama kifi, yin hoto, kallon tsuntsaye da kuma ziyartar wurin hutawa da kuma koyan ilimi game da labarin muhallin.

translation.en: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
translation.ha: Alal misali, shi ne ziyara da daukar hoto da kuma koyon abubuwan a Borneo.
