translation.ha: Ra’ayoyin da aka gabatar galibi na gaggawa ne, na gaba daya kuma marar zurfin tunani idan aka kwatanta su da cikakken bayanin da ake samu a wani wuri.

translation.en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
translation.ha: Mummunan yanayi kalma ce ga duk wani yanayi mai hatsari tare da yiwuwar haifar da lalacewa, rikicewar zamantakewar jama'a, ko asarar rayuwar ɗan adam.

translation.en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
translation.ha: Yanayi mai tsanani na iya aukuwa a ko wani bangare na duniya kuma sun bambanta, kuma sun dogara ne ga yanayin kasa da taswirar kasa da kuma ka’idojin iskar shaka.

translation.en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
translation.ha: Babban iska, ƙanƙara, hazo mai yawa, da gobarar daji siffofi ne da tasirin mummunan yanayi, haka ma hadari, guguwa, kogin ruwa, da mahaukaciyar guguwa.

translation.en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
translation.ha: Aukuwar tsananin yanayin yanki da na lokacin sun hada da guguwar iska, hadari mai dusar kankara, guguwar kankara, da guguwar ƙura.

translation.en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
translation.ha: Ana matuƙar shawartar matafiya da su kasance masu lura da duk wani haɗarin mummunan yanayi wanda zai shafi yankin su domin za su iya shafar duk wani shirin tafiya.

translation.en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
translation.ha: Duk wanda ke shirin ziyara zuwa wata ƙasa da za a iya kallonta a zaman fagen yaƙi dole ya samu horon ƙwararru.

translation.en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
translation.ha: Binciken yanar gizo don ‘yanayin muhalli mai tsanani’ yana iya fitar adireshin wani kamfanin gargajiya.

translation.en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
translation.ha: Hanya koyaushe za ta rufe dukkan batutuwan da aka tattauna a nan cikin mafi cikakken bayani, yawanci tare da ƙwarewar aiki.

translation.en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
translation.ha: Wani kwas wanda za a yi cikin kwana 2-5 wanda zai shafi aikin da ya kunshi horarwa kan agajin gaggawa da kuma a wasu lokutan har da horarwa na makamai.

translation.en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
translation.ha: Littattafai da mujallu masu ma'amala da rayuwar jeji sanannu ne, amma wallafe-wallafen da ke magana game da yankunan yaƙi ba su da yawa.

translation.en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
translation.ha: dole sai matafiya masu kokarin yin tiyatar canza jinsi sun tabbatar suna dauke da ingantattun takardun tafiyar komawa gida.

translation.en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
translation.ha: Kaunar gwamnatoci don bayar da fasfo ɗin da jinsi ba a bayyana ba (X) ko takaddun da aka sabunta don daidaita sunan da ake so kuma jinsi ya bambanta.

translation.en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
translation.ha: Kasancewar yardar gwamnatocin kasashen waje don girmama waɗannan takardu yana da saurin canzawa.

translation.en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
translation.ha: Bincike a wuraren bincike na jami’an tsaro su ma sun zama da karin shishigi bayan zamanin Satumba 11, 2001.

translation.en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
translation.ha: kada mutanen da suka sauya jinsinsu su yi tsammanin za su iya wuce wa ta gaban na’urorin haska hoton jiki ba tare da fallasar sirri da mutuncinsu ba.

translation.en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
translation.ha: Igiyar ruwa mai yagawa su ne ruwa ne mai dawowa daga raƙuman ruwa da ke fasa rairayin bakin teku.

translation.en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
translation.ha: Saboda yanayin karkashin ruwa da ke sa gudana da mai da hankali a wurare masu zurfi, sannan igiyar ruwa mafi zurfi na iya haduwa a wurin.

translation.en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
translation.ha: Yawancin mace-mace suna faruwa ne sakamakon gajiya da ke ƙoƙari ya koma baya kan na yanzu, wanda ƙila ba zai yiwu ba.

translation.en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
translation.ha: Da zarar ka fita daga ruwan, sake komawa ruwan ba zai zo da wata sarkakiya ba.

translation.en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
translation.ha: Yi ƙoƙarin auna wani wuri inda ba za a sake samun ka ba ko kuma, ya danganta da ƙwarewarka da kuma cewa ko an gan ka, watakila za ka so jiran ceto.

translation.en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
translation.ha: Kaɗuwar sake-shiga za ta yi saurin zuwa kafin kaɗuwar al’adu (akwai karancin lokaci na hutun amarci), ya dade, kuma izai ya zama da tsanani sosai.

translation.en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
translation.ha: Matafiya waɗanda ke da sauƙin sauƙaƙawa zuwa sabon al'adun a wasu lokuta suna da matukar wahalar gyara al'adunsu na asali.

translation.en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
translation.ha: Lokacin dawowa gida bayan zama a ƙasashen waje, kun saba da sabon al'adun kuma kun rasa wasu al'adunku daga al'adunku na gida.

translation.en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
translation.ha: Kasancewa a kasar waje a karo na farko, na sa matafiya yin hakuri da nuna fahimta, saboda sanin cewa matafiya na bukatar hakan domin su saba da wajen.

translation.en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
translation.ha: Ba lallai Mutane su fahimci cewa yin haƙuri da nuna fahimta wajibi ne ga matafiya da ke kokarin komawa gida.

translation.en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
translation.ha: Sautin dala da wasan haske na daya daga cikin abubuwa masu dadi a fanni kananan yara.

translation.en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
translation.ha: Za ka iya ganin dalar a cikin duhu kuma za ka iya ganin su a tsanake kafin shirin ya fara.

translation.en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
translation.ha: Yawanci kodayaushe ka kan ji sautin ‘yan yawon shakatawa da masu talla. Labarin sauti da hasken to kawai kamar littafin labari ne.

translation.en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
translation.ha: An yi amfani da sassaken zaki na Egypt a matsayin jigo wajen bada dogon labari.

translation.en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
translation.ha: Ana nuna wuraren akan dalar kuma an haskaka dalolin mabambanta.

translation.en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
translation.ha: Tsibirin Kudancin Shetland, wanda aka gano a cikin 1819, kasashe da yawa suna da'awar su kuma suna da mafi yawan tushe, tare da goma sha shida suna aiki a 2020.

translation.en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
translation.ha: Tsibirin na kwanciye 120 km arewa da sashin kasa mai shiga teku. Mafi girma shine King George Island mai dauke da mazauna na Villa Estrellas.

translation.en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
translation.ha: Sauran sun hada da Livingston Island, da Yaudarar Inda ambaliyar caldera na har dutsen mai fitad da wuta yana ba da tashar jiragen ruwa na halitta.

translation.en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
translation.ha: Ellsworth Land shine yanki na kudu da masarautar, da Tekun Bellingshausen ya daure.

translation.en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
translation.ha: Tsaunukan da ke nan wurin a Tsibirin sun haɗe da yankin mai tudu, sannan suka sake bulla a gaba inda suka haifar da jerin carbin Tsaunukan Elsworth na tsawon kilomita 360, wanda dunkulen Ƙanƙarar Minnesota ya ratsa ta tsakiyarsu.

translation.en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
translation.ha: Yankin arewacin ko Sentinel Range yana da tsaunukan tsaunuka mafi girma na Antarctica, Vinson Massif, wanda yake hawa sama a tsaunin 4892 m Mount Vinson.

translation.en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
translation.ha: A wurare masu nisa, idan babu sabis na wayar salula, wayar tauraron dan adam na iya zama zaɓin ku kaɗai.

translation.en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
translation.ha: Wayar tauraron dan adam a gaba daya ba za ta maye gurbin wayar hannu ba, domin sai kun kasance a waje tare da yin saiti da tauraron dan adam don yin kiran da wayar.

translation.en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
translation.ha: Ana amfani sosai da aikin a harkokin sufurin ruwa, wanda ya hada da jiragen shakatawa da masu bincike da ke bukatar sadarwa a lungu ko bukatar muryoyi.

translation.en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
translation.ha: Yakamata kamfanin wayar tarho na yankin ku ya kasance zai iya bada ƙarin bayani game da yin haɗi da wannan sabis ɗin.

translation.en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
translation.ha: Wani zaɓi da ya ke kara samun karbuwa ga waɗanda ke shirin ratar-shekara shine yin tafiya don sani.

translation.en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
translation.ha: Wannan ya shahara musamman ga masu tsallake-tsallake a makaranta, suna basu damar ɗaukar shekara guda kafin jami'a, ba tare da lalata karatunsu ba.

translation.en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
translation.ha: A lokuta da dama shiga/fara kwas na ratan shekara guda a ketare zai iya inganta damammakinka na kara nosawa gaba a karatu idan ka dawo kasar haihuwarka.

translation.en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
translation.ha: Yawanci za a sami kuɗin karatun shiga don shiga cikin waɗannan shirye-shiryen ilimin.

translation.en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
translation.ha: Finland babban wurin zuwan kwalekwale ne. “Ƙasa mai tafkuna dubu” tana kuma da dubban tsibirai, a cikin tafkuna da kuma cikin rukunin tsibirai.

translation.en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
translation.ha: A yankunan masu tsibirai barjak da tafkuna ba lallaia bukaci kanana jiragen ruwaba.

translation.en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
translation.ha: Kodayake tarin tsibirai na bakin teku da manyan tabkuna suna da girman isa ga kowane jirgin ruwa, ƙananan jiragen ruwa ko ma kayak suna ba da kwarewa daban.

translation.en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
translation.ha: Jirgin ruwa jirgi ne na kasar Finland, tare da kwale-kwale ga kowane mutum bakwai ko takwas.

translation.en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
translation.ha: Wannan ya dace da Norway, Sweden da New Zealand, amma in ba haka ba ya zama na musamman (misali a cikin Netherlands adadi ɗaya ne zuwa arba'in).

translation.en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
translation.ha: Yawancin sanannun Baltic Cruises sun ƙunshi karin tsawan zama a St. Petersburg, Russia.

translation.en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
translation.ha: Wannan na nuna cewa kana iya ziyartar birni mai tarihi na kwanaki da dama yayin da ake dawowa ko yin bacci a cikin jirgin ruwan da dare.

translation.en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
translation.ha: Idan ka hau ruwa ta amfani da yawon bude ido a jirgin ruwa ba za ka buƙaci biza ta daban ba (kamar daga 2009).

translation.en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
translation.ha: Wasu jiragen ruwa su kan sanya Berlin, Jamus a cikin littafin bayanin. Kamar yadda ka ke gani daga taswirar da ke sama babu inda Berlin ta yi kusa da teku kuma ba a haɗa ziyarar birnin ba a farashin jirgi.

translation.en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
translation.ha: Tafiya ta hanyar jirgin sama kan iya zama abu mai firgitarwa ga mutane a duk rukunin shekaru da asali, musamman idan ba su taɓa hawa jirgi ba ko kuma sun taɓa shiga al’amari mai firgitarwa.

translation.en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
translation.ha: Ba abun jin kunya bane: bata sha bambam da tsoro da kuma rashin kaunar abubuwan da yawancin mutane ke dashi.

translation.en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
translation.ha: Ga wasu, fahimtar yadda jirgi yake aiki da kuma ko mene ne ke faruwa yayin da jirgin yake tafiya watakila ya taimaka wajen shawo kan fargabar da tushenta ba a ma san shi ba ko kuma ma ba a iya shawo kansa.

translation.en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
translation.ha: A na biyan kamfanonin aika saƙonni sosai don isar da abubuwa da sauri. Akai-akai, lokaci yana da matukar mahimmanci game da takardun kasuwanci, abin sayarwa ko kayan gyara don gyara na gaggawa.

translation.en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
translation.ha: A wasu hanyoyin, manyan kanfanonin na da jiragen samansu, amma a wasu hanyoyi daban da ƙananan kanfanoni akwai matsala.

translation.en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
translation.ha: Idan sun aika da kaya ta hanyar jigilar jirgin sama, akan wasu hanyoyi ya zama ya dauki kwanaki kafin a ya tsallake saukewa na ‘yan kwastam.

translation.en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
translation.ha: Hanya kaɗai mafi saurin wucewarsu shine ta hanyar tura su a matsayin jakunkunan da aka duba. Tsarin dokokin kamfunan zirga-zirgar jiragen sama ba ya bada damar tura jaka ba tare da mai ita zai yi tafiya ba, to anan ne inda za ka shigo.

translation.en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
translation.ha: Sananniyar hanya ta tashi a ajin farko ko ajin kasuwanci na jirgin sama shine ka fito da damin kudi domin gata (ko, mafi kyau tukuna, ka sanya kamfaninka su yi maka).

translation.en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
translation.ha: Sai dai hakan ba ya samuwa cikin sauƙi: a matsayin ƙa’idar ana tsammanin ka biya ribi hudu na ajin marasa karfi kuma ribi goma sha daya na ajin masu wadataa

translation.en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
translation.ha: A gabaɗaya, babu ma'ana a cikin koda neman ragi don kasuwanci ko kujerun ajin farko a kan jiragen sama kai tsaye daga A zuwa B.

translation.en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
translation.ha: Kamfanonin jiragen sama sun sani sarai cewa akwai wasu rukuni na rukuni na wasiƙa waɗanda suke shirye su biya dala mafi girma don alfarmar zuwa wani wuri cikin sauri da jin daɗi, kuma su biya hakan.

translation.en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
translation.ha: Babban birnin Moldova shi ne Chişinău. yaren cikin gida shi ne Romaniyanci, amma ana amfani da harshen Rasha sosai.

translation.en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
translation.ha: Maldova jamhuriya ce mai kabilu da dama da ta yi fama da rikicin kabilanci.

translation.en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1994, wannan rikici ya haifar da kirkirar da kanta mai ikirarin Jamhuriyyar Transnistria a gabashin Moldova, wacce ke da gwamnatinta da kudin ta amma ba wata kungiyar mambobin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta amince da shi ba.

translation.en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
translation.ha: An maido da harkar cinikayya tsakanin bangarori biyu na Maldova duk da rushewar tattaunawar siyasa.

translation.en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
translation.ha: Babban addini a Moldova shine Kiristocin aqidah.

translation.en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
translation.ha: Izmir shi ne birni na uku mafi girma a Turkiyya da yawan jama’a kimanin miliyan 3.7, kuma tashar jiragen ruwa ta biyu mafi girma bayan ta Istanbul, kuma babbar cibiyar sufuri.

translation.en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
translation.ha: A da yana a matsayin tsohon birnin Smyrna, yanzu cibiyar hada-hadar kasuwanci ce ta zamani, da ta bnƙasa, da ta ke zagayen wani ƙaton mashigin ruwa sannan kuma yana zagaye da duwatsu.

translation.en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
translation.ha: Manya-manyan tituna, gidajen gilashi da manyan kantunan siyayya an kawata su da jajayen rufi na gargajiya, kasuwa ta karni na 18, da wani tsohon masallaci da coci, koda yake dai garin ya fi kama da irin na turai da ke gabar bahar rum fiye da ace garin gargajiya ne a kasar Turkiya.

translation.en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
translation.ha: Kauyen Haldarsvík yana ba da damar kallon tsibirin Eysturoy da ke kusa kuma yana da wata cocin mai kusurwa takwas wadda ba saba ganin irin ta ba.

translation.en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
translation.ha: A cikin farfajiyar majami'ar, akwai zane-zanen marmara mai ban sha'awa na kurciya akan wasu kaburburan.

translation.en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
translation.ha: Shafe rabin sa’a na tattaki a cikin shu’umin ƙauyen ya biya.

translation.en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
translation.ha: Ta gefen arewa mai saukin shiga nan ne Birnin Sintra ya ke wanda ya shahara ga yan kasashen waje bayan da Lord Byron ya bada kayatattun labaran kyawonta.

translation.en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
translation.ha: Scotturb Bus 403 na yin tafiya sosai zuwa Sintra, tare da dakatawa a Cabo da Roca.

translation.en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
translation.ha: Hakanan zuwa arewa ziyarci babban Wuri Mai Tsarki na Uwargidanmu Fatima (Shrine), wuri ne na shahararrun bayyanar Marian a duniya.

translation.en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
translation.ha: Da fatan za a tuna cewa da gaske ana ziyartar babban kabari ne, kazalika da shafin da ke da kusan ma'ana ga yawancin ɓangarorin duniya.

translation.en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
translation.ha: Har yanzu akwai maza da mata da yawa da ke raye waɗanda suka rayu lokacinsu a nan, kuma da yawa da yawa waɗanda suke da ƙaunatattunsu waɗanda aka kashe ko suka yi aiki zuwa can, yahudawa da waɗanda ba Yahudawa ba.

translation.en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
translation.ha: Da fatan za a kula da rukunin yanar gizon tare da dukkan mutunci, girmamawa da girmama shi. Kada ku yi ba'a game da fitinar Holocaust ko Nazis.

translation.en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
translation.ha: Kada ku lalata wurin ginin ta hanyar sa alamar ko kuma nuna alamar rubutu a cikin ginin.

translation.en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
translation.ha: Harsunan Barcelona na yau da kullun sune Catalan da Spanish. Kimanin rabin sun fi son yin magana da Catalan, yawancinsu sun fahimce shi, kuma kusan kowa ya san Sifen.

translation.en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
translation.ha: Ko da yake, ana nuna galibin alamomin ana nuna su Katalanci sakamakon bisa doka shi ne yaren hukumana farko.

translation.en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, ana kuma amfani da harshen Spanish sosai a harkar sufuri na jama’a da wasu wurare.

translation.en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
translation.ha: Ana yin sanarwar yau da gobe a jirgin ƙarƙashin ƙasa a Catalan kaɗai, amma na’urar da ke aiki da kanta ce ke sanar da hargitsin da babu shiri a harsuna iri-iri da suka haɗa da Sifaniyanci, Turanci, Faransanci, Larabci da harshen Japan.

translation.en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
translation.ha: Mutanen Paris sun yi suna kan son kai, rashin kunya da girman kai.

translation.en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake wannan yawanci ra’ayi ne wanda ba daidai ba, hanya mafi kyau don yin sabo a cikin Paris har yanzu shine kasancewa kan halayyarka mafi kyau, yin aiki kamar wanda yake “bien élevé” (wanda ya sami tarbiyya mai kyau). Zai sanya yin sabo ya kasance mai sauki.

translation.en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
translation.ha: Fuskar mutanen Paris ta bazata za ta yi saurin ɓacewa idan ka nuna wasu halayen girmamawa.

translation.en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
translation.ha: Tafkunan Plitvice na wajen shakatawa yana da wani surkukin daji, galibi da kamannin bishiyoyin fir da na kudan zuma da kuma hadin wanda ya shafi manyan tsaunuka da duwatsu tare da ciyaye na Rum.

translation.en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
translation.ha: Tana da sanannun dangogin itatuwa iri daban-daban, sabo da jerin yankunan yanayi da ta ke da su, da bayyana nau’ukan ƙasa daban-daban da kuma tuddai masu mataki daban-daban.

translation.en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
translation.ha: Rukunin muhalli na ga dabbobin daji mabambanta da kuma launukan tsuntsaye.

translation.en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
translation.ha: Dabbobin daji da ba su da yawa irin su Malu mai launin ruwan kasa da ke turai, kerkeci, mikiya, mujiya, kyanwar daji da kuma capercaillie a na iya samun su a can, tare da nau’ukan gama garin dabbobi masu yawa.

translation.en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
translation.ha: Yayin ziyartar gidajen sufaye, an buƙaci mata su sa riguna masu rufe gwiwowinsu kuma su rufe ƙafadunsu, kuma.

translation.en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
translation.ha: Mafi yawancin gidajen ibada suna samar da mayafai ga matan da ba su zo da shiri ba, amma idan ki ka zo da naki, musamman wanda yake da launuka masu haske, za ki sami murmushi daga mai bauta namiji ko mace a ƙofar shiga.

translation.en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
translation.ha: A bisa wannan madogara, ana buƙatar maza su sanya wanduna da ke rufe gwiwoyi.

translation.en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
translation.ha: Wannan ma za a iya aro shi daga tarin kayan a mashigar amma ba a wanke tufa bayan kowane mutum guda ya yi amfani da tufar don haka ba za ka/ki ji dadin saka wannan bujen ba. Kala guda zai iyamma dukkanin maza.

translation.en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
translation.ha: Babban abincin, kamar na yankuna masu kama da wannan a cikin Bahar Rum, ya dogara ne akan burodi, kayan lambu da nama (musamman alade), kuma yana amfani da man zaitun ko'ina.

translation.en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
translation.ha: Abincin dare mai sauki musamman ma lokacin bazara, shi ne na Pa amb Oli: Burodi ne da man zaitun da tumatir da kuma duk wani kayan hadin da ya samu kamar cukwui da abincin kifi da dai sauransu.

translation.en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
translation.ha: Dukkan sunaye, wadanda ke da kalmar Sie a ciki, koda yaushe suna farawa ne da babban harafi, koda a tsakiyar jimla ne.

translation.en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
translation.ha: Wannan mahimmiyar hanya ce wajen banbance kalmomin aikatau da kalmomi na abubuwa da ake iya gani.

translation.en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
translation.ha: Hakanan yana iya kawo sauƙin karatu, kodayake rubutu yana da ɗan rikitarwa ta hanyar buƙatar gano ko ana amfani da fi'ili ko sifa a cikin sigar tabbatarwa.

translation.en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
translation.ha: Furuci yana da ɗan sauƙi a cikin Italiyanci tunda yawancin kalmomi ana furta daidai yadda ake rubuta suu

translation.en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
translation.ha: Manyan haruffan da ya kamata a lura da su a nan sune c da g, kasancewar furucinsu ya banbamta daga wannan wasalin da ke biye.

translation.en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
translation.ha: Hakanan, tabbatar da furta r da rr daban: caro yana nufin ƙaunata, yayin da karas yana nufin karusa.

translation.en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
translation.ha: Farisa tana da nahawu mai sauki da na yau da kullum.

translation.en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, karanta wannan share fagen nahawun zai taimaka muku koya da yawa game da nahawun Farisanci da fahimtar jumla da kyau.

translation.en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
translation.ha: A bayyane take, idan ka san yaren Romance, zai yi sauki maka ka koyi Portuguese.

translation.en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, mutanen da ba su iya yaren sifaniyanci sosai ba ke ganin yaren Portuguese ya yi kusa da shi yadda ba lallai a karance shi daban ba.

translation.en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
translation.ha: Yawanci hasumiyoyin nazarin samaniya na baya sun zama tsohon yayi yanzu, inda suka zama gidajen kayan tarihi, ko kuma wuraren koyon ilimi.

translation.en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda gurbacewar haske a lokacin ganiyasa ba kamar irin yadda matsalar take a halin yanzu ba, galibi ya fi yawa a birane da kuma harabobin makarantun jami’a, wanda ya fi saukin samuwa akan wadanda aka gina a birane.

translation.en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
translation.ha: Yawancin gilasan hangen nesa na bincike na zamani kayayyaki ne masu girma sosai a yankunan da ke da tsarin yanayi masu kyau.

translation.en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
translation.ha: Kallon buɗewar furen cherry, wanda aka sani da hanami, ya kasance wani ɓangare na al'adun Japan tun ƙarni na 8.

translation.en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
translation.ha: Tunanin ya fito ne daga China inda plum da suka yi girma sun kasance fure ne wanda aka fi so.

translation.en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
translation.ha: A Japan, sarkin ne ya shirya kungiyar siyasa na farko don kan sa kawai da wasu membobin da ke da martaba kewaye da kotun sarakuna..

translation.en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
translation.ha: Tsirrai sun fi kyau idan suna muhallinsu na halitta, saboda haka guji zumuɗin tsige ko da samfur “daya ne kawai”.

translation.en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
translation.ha: Idan kana ziyartar shiryayen lambu, tattara “samfurori” shi ma zai iya jawo wa a fitar da kai, ba tare da tattaunawa ba.

translation.en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
translation.ha: Garin Singapore gari ne da akasari ya ke da tsaro ingantacce kuma da saukin ganewa, kuma ka na iya siyen komai daga saukarka a kasar.

translation.en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
translation.ha: Amma ana sanya ku a cikin “manyan yankuna masu tsaka-tsakin” kawai 'yan digiri kaɗan arewacin kerjin za ku buƙaci ma'amala da zafin rana (koyaushe) da rana mai ƙarfi (lokacin da sama ta bayyana, mafi wuya).

translation.en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
translation.ha: Akwai kuma motocin bas kaɗan masu tafiya arewa zuwa Hebron, asalin wurin da aka binne shugabanni da aka ambata a baibul Ibrahim, Isa, Yakub, da matansu.

translation.en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
translation.ha: Ka tabbatar motar da zaka shiga lalle wadda za ta je Hebron ce ba wadanda ke zuwa sabbin unguwanni yahudawa da ke Kiryat Arba ba ne.

translation.en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
translation.ha: Jirgin ruwa na cikin gida na iya zama jigo mai kyau don kafa hutu a kusa.

translation.en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
translation.ha: A misali ziyartar fadoji a Loire Valley, kwarin Rhine ko hawan jirgin ruwa zuwa wurare masu ban sha’awa a Danube ko tafiya cikin kwalekwale ta Erie Canal.

translation.en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
translation.ha: Hakanan suna ayyana hanyoyi don shahararrun tattaki da hanyoyin keke.

translation.en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
translation.ha: Kirsimeti wani biki ne mai mahimmanci na Kiristanci, kuma ana bikinta a matsayin ranar haihuwar Yesu.

translation.en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
translation.ha: Da yawan an al’adun da ke zgaye da bikin sun sami karɓuwa har daga waɗanda ba su yi imani ba a kasashen kristoci da waɗanda bana kristoci ba a fadin duniya.

translation.en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
translation.ha: Akwai wata al'ada ta kwanan zaune a daren Easter a wani wuri buɗaɗɗe don ganin fitowar rana.

translation.en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
translation.ha: Tabbas da akwai bayanai daga koyarwar addinin Kirista kan wannan al’adar, amma dai yana iya kasancewa Shekaru ne gabanin bayyanar Kiristanci.

translation.en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
translation.ha: Churchesarin majami'u na gargajiya sau da yawa suna yin Vigil na Easter a daren Asabar a lokacin karshen mako na Ista, tare da ikilisiyoyin galibi suna shiga cikin murna a tsakar dare don bikin tashin Almasihu.

translation.en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
translation.ha: Duk dabbobin da suka isa tsibirin asalin sun zo nan ne ta hanyar iyo, tashi ko iyo.

translation.en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
translation.ha: Saboda doguwar nesa daga nahiyoyi masu shayarwa ba su iya yin tafiyar ba wanda ya sa katowar kunkuru matsayin dabba ta farko da ake kiwo a Galapagos.

translation.en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
translation.ha: Tun zuwan mutum ga Galapagos, an gabatar da dabbobi masu shayarwa da yawa da suka hada da awaki, dawakai, shanu, beraye, kuliyoyi da karnuka.

translation.en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
translation.ha: Idan ka ziyarci nahiyar Arctic ko Antarctica a lokacin hunturu zaka tsinkayi daren sanyi, wanda a lokacinsa rana bata fitowa.

translation.en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
translation.ha: Wannan yana ba da kyakkyawar dama don ganin Aurora borealis, tunda sama zata kasance mai duhu sosai ko ƙasa da agogo.

translation.en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
translation.ha: Tunda yankunan ba su da cinkoson jama’a, kuma babu matsalar gurɓacewar haske, za kuma ka ji daɗin taurarin.

translation.en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
translation.ha: Al’adun aiki na Japanese na da matsayi fiye da abin da kasashen yamma suka saba.

translation.en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
translation.ha: Kaya masu kala ɗaya su ne cikakkun tufafin mu’amala, kuma abokan aiki kan kira junansu da sunan iyalinsu ko da muƙaman aiki.

translation.en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
translation.ha: Yarjejeniyar wurin aiki yana da mahimmanci, yana jaddada ƙoƙarin kungiya ne maimakon yaba wa nasarorin da mutum ya samu.

translation.en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
translation.ha: Dole ne ma’aikata su sami amincewar manyan su akan duk wata shawara da suka zartas, kuma ana tsammanin su yi biyayya ga umarnin manyan su ba tare da tambaya ba.
